data.persona: I ride in boats to catch fish. I catch fish in the ocean. I usually get a boat full of fish.
data.description:
You are in the Fishing shack.
The fishing shack is a small wooden structure that is crudely built and is surrounded by boats. The wood flooring around the shack is well weathered and often used.
There's a small wooden structure, a boat, a wood flooring, and a pole here.
The fish and the villager are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to sell the small wooden structure to the villager
data.mid_motivation: I plan to use the money I get to repair my boat today
data.long_motivation: I hope to make enough money from fishing to get another wooden structure in a few months

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: give Small wooden structure  to Villager
